description:
http://KEXP.ORG presents Pedro the Lion performing live in the KEXP studio. Recorded August 27, 2024.

Songs:
Santa Cruz 00:39
Tall Pines 03:25
Modesto 06:35
Spend Time  10:36
 
Dave Bazan - Lead Vocals, Drums
Erik Walters - Electric Guitar, Backing Vocals
Rebecca Cole - Keyboard, Backing Vocals

Host: Troy Nelson
Audio Engineer: Jon Roberts
Mastering Engineer: Matt Ogaz

Cameras: Jim Beckmann, Scott Holpainen, Jonathan Jacobson & Luke Knecht
Editor: Luke Knecht

http://pedrothelion.com
http://kexp.org

title: Pedro the Lion - Full Performance (Live on KEXP)
